content: {"name": "The Hope Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our food bags (through our food pantry) are available to anyone in need. To receive a food bag, call 301-739-1165 during office hours (Monday-Friday 8:00-4:30 PM) to schedule an appointment to pick up a food bag", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "125 North Prospect Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hagerstown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21740", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.646126, "longitude": -77.7228169}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 739-1165", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}]}
